title: Tab Bar in Dark Mode
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB X app is installed on an Android device
And the user has selected a favorite team
custom_steps:
When the user opens the side nav
and selects settings
custom_expected: Then the settings mode menu should appear

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the screen appearance should appear in dark mode in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps back twice to access the scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the scoreboard should appear in Dark Mode
And the tab bar should appear in Dark Mode
And the item tab in focus should be the favorite team's primary color

custom_steps_separated.content: When the above steps are completed while logged in/not logged in as an entitled user
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the results are the same as above

title: Tab Bar Default Settings
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user who has not selected a default tab setting

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user starts the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should be shown the first tab of the app, known as the “MLB Default”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the Settings area
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user must be presented with an option to set default tab from one of the pre-defined options

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects default tab setting
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app must remember this setting for the device

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user who has selected a default tab setting
AND the default tab setting selected is in another position in the tab bar
WHEN Starting the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be shown their default tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user who has selected a default tab setting
AND the default tab setting selected is NOT currently found in the tab bar
WHEN starting the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should be shown the “MLB Default” tab
